articles.title: Alarming Virus Evolution – Scientists Identify First-Ever Mammal-to-Human Bird Flu Case - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The Biological Threat Research Laboratory (BTRL) at Texas Tech University was instrumental in identifying the first case of highly pathogenic avian influenza (HPAI) A (H5N1) being transmitted from a mammal (dairy cow) to a human. The case was made public in a…
articles.content: Texas Tech’s BTRL confirmed the first human case of HPAI A (H5N1) transmitted from a dairy cow, marking a significant milestone in understanding the virus’s transmission and prompting immediate and e… [+3189 chars]

articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: Vineet Nayyar, former Vice Chairman of Tech Mahindra, passes away at 85; Anand Mahindra pays tribute - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Vineet Nayyar passes away: Former MD and CEO of Tech Mahindra, CP Gurnani wrote, “Heartbreaking news..India has lost one its finest leaders today.”
articles.content: Vineet Nayyar, the former executive Vice Chairman of Tech Mahindra passed away at the age of 85. Tributes poured in from industry bodies and eminent personalities. IT industry body Nasscom took to so… [+2060 chars]
